alert.note: Alert for Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 01 at 5:16PM CST until March 01 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN POLK COUNTY... At 515 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shady, or 11 miles south of Mena, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mena... Shady... Hartley... Opal... Cossatot River State Park... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Big Fork... Board Camp... Nunley... Ink... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Roaring Branch Natural Area... Dallas... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for western Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
